jisa.devices

Class LS336

  • java.lang.Object
    • jisa.visa.VISADevice
      • jisa.devices.TC
        • jisa.devices.MSTC
          • jisa.devices.MSMOTC
            • jisa.devices.LS336

  • public class LS336
extends MSMOTController
    Class for controlling Lake Shore Model 336 temperature controllers. They are generally annoying with a shoddy communications implementation. Hooray!

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class JISA.Devices.MSMOTController
